SENT.plain: We describe a case of acute myeloblastic leukemia with a novel isochromosome 18, i(18)(p10), preceded by aplastic anemia for six months
The patient is a cotton grower chronically exposed to pesticides
The significance of this chromosomal abnormality is unknown
The possible relationship to the preceding history of aplastic anemia and occupational pesticide exposure is speculated on
The possible mechanism of the association of acute leukemia and aplastic anemia is discussed
